data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Giacomin, Leandro L., Stehmann, Joao R. (2014): Three new species of Solanum (Brevantherum Clade) endemic to the Brazilian Atlantic Forest. PhytoKeys 38: 69-87, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.38.7055, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.38.7055
